catalogEntries.title: Level-Up Pack
catalogEntries.shortDescription: Rewards every 10 levels up to level 150, including Legendary Hero Traces!
catalogEntries.description:
<RT.CapsGreen>Complete Skybreaker Quests as you level!</>
<RT.BasicMed>Receive a Level Up Package every 10 levels from 10 to 150</>
<RT.BasicMed>Packages are retroactive</>  

<RT.CapsGold>Level Up Package Contents</> 
  <RT.BasicMed>1000 Core Hero Traces</>
  <RT.BasicMed>100k Gold</>

<RT.BasicMed>The final package contains 100 Legendary Hero Traces!</>
